title: Email got hacked, i need to change email in account but it does not work.
body:
My hotmail got hacked few weeks ago and now league is saying my account got logged in elsewhere.
I want to change my email but it keeps saying to verify my old email... please i need help! Every game i get into, the client sends me a notification and kicks me out!

replies.body: Oh god i forgot about that ugh! Thanks Omastar and Targons, ill do that ASAP.

We can assist you if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), as *Omastar* mentioned. 

Just as a heads-up, due to the end of the season causing a lot of tickets to be submitted, it may take a bit longer than normal for one of our account specialists to get back to you. Let me know if you have any questions.
Have you sent a Ticket to the Riot Support already?
